mapper.select: select distinct CellInPut, Material_FK,Project from ( select CellInPut, Material_FK,Project from SD_O_MPSModelDetail WHERE CellInPut is not null union all select CellInPut, Material_FK,Project from SD_O_MPSModelDetailHis WHERE CellInPut is not null ) t order by CellInPut

select distinct ArrayInPut, TFTMtrl,Project from ( select ArrayInPut, TFTMtrl,Project from SD_O_MPSModelDetail WHERE ArrayInPut is not null union all select ArrayInPut, TFTMtrl,Project from SD_O_MPSModelDetailHis WHERE ArrayInPut is not null ) t ORDER BY ArrayInPut

select DISTINCT CellInPut_PC, Material_FK from ( select CellInPut_PC, Material_FK from SD_O_MPSModelDetail where CellInPut_PC is not NULL and ValidFlag=1 union all select CellInPut_PC, Material_FK from SD_O_MPSModelDetailHis where CellInPut_PC is not NULL and ValidFlag=1 ) t
select DISTINCT DateOfInsert from SD_D_MPSDetailbyDateNewHis where ValidFlag=1 and InsertType='release'

select CellInPut,OutOfDate, SUM(qty) as qty from ( select (select DISTINCT CellInPut from SD_O_MPSModelDetail b where b.ValidFlag=1 and b.CellOutPut=MPSKey) as CellInPut, Cast(Value as decimal(10,3)) as qty, * from SD_D_MPSDetailbyDateNewHis where ValidFlag=1 and InsertType='release' and OutOfDate like '%Total%' and DateOfInsert = #{dateOfInsert} and MPSColumn='CellInPut' )t where CellInPut is not null GROUP BY CellInPut,OutOfDate order by CellInPut
select * from SD_D_MPSDetailbyDateNewHis where ValidFlag=1 and InsertType='release' and OutOfDate like '%Total%' and MPSColumn='ArrayInPut' and MPSKey <> '' and DateOfInsert = #{dateOfInsert}

select Material_FK + Version as product, LCM1InQty as lcm1Qty, LCM2InQty as lcm2Qty from SD_D_FCSTPSIManagementItemHis where InsertType='release' and ValidFlag=1 and MaterialType='MDL' and (LCM1InQty>0 or LCM2InQty>0) and [Year]=#{year} and [Month]=#{month}
